about_the_game:
Welcome to Fule: An Interstellar Odyssey

Embark on this interstellar odyssey where your choices mold the fabric of narratives, and the cosmos responds to your every decision. How will your story unfurl among the stars?

Handcrafted Narratives

Experience over 20 (WIP - more coming soon!) intricately crafted narratives, each influenced by your choices - from passenger selection to ship management and past decisions. Your journey isn't just about traveling; it's about steering the course of these narratives, where your decisions carry real weight and impact.

Strategic Personnel Management

Recruit and level up personnel to become indispensable allies during conflicts and narratives. Their expertise and support become pivotal in navigating the unknown, aiding you in your cosmic endeavors.

Cargo & Equipment

Equip your ship strategically with a diverse array of gear & cargo, altering outcomes in your favor. Unpredictability reigns, as your choices offer unexpected solutions to unforeseen challenges.

Species Diversity

Encounter a plethora of species, each harboring internal conflicts and unique traits. Understanding these intricacies isn't just intriguing; it's the strategic advantage that influences outcomes in your favor. Personnel can provide valuable insights into these quirks.

Dynamic Ship Upgrades

Upgrade various ship components - increase cargo space, fortify security against mischievous personalities, enhance life support for more passengers, and boost engine power for faster journeys. Adaptability is your key to survival in this ever-evolving universe.

Procedural Generation

Explore the vastness of a procedurally generated cosmos. Every voyage introduces new equipment, diverse passengers, and unique personnel. The universe offers boundless challenges and limitless opportunities for those daring enough to seek them.

content_descriptors.notes: The game touches on many fantastical & real drugs and integrates them into the narratives procedurally.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel Macs
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any Mac in the past 5 years should be great.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel Macs
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: FULE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Really anything made in the past decade will probably do it.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Any Intel i5 series or AMD FX chipsets
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If your computer isn't a literal dinosaur, it should be great!

short_description: Embark on an Interstellar Odyssey! Captain your own starship amidst a network of bustling transit stations, ferrying passengers of diverse species. Upgrade your vessel, navigate volatile interspecies relations, and avert cosmic chaos in this thrilling sci-fi saga!
